data.name: The Futanati
data.detailed_description:
Cyber security consultant by day, dangerously curious hacker by night--you stumble upon something sinister; something strange; something...sexy.

Soon after learning about their existence, you find yourself face-to-face with The Futanati.
After not being given much of a choice, the only way to stay alive is by compliance.

I've already said too much...

Read through some pretty raunchy(erotic) dialogue, accompanied by spicy nude depictions.

Gameplay

Kinetic Visual Novel

H-Scenes
~4K words

Immerse yourself in the story by typing in your own name, then proceeding to read through a raunchy story from the first-person perspective.

data.short_description: Being the curious hacker, you stumble upon something that wasn't meant for your eyes. Something sinister, strange and...sexy.

content_descriptors.notes:
*All characters in this game are over the age of 21 years old.

- Futanari
- Humiliation
- Exploitation
